name: app.thoughtspot/mcp-server
description: MCP Server for ThoughtSpot - provides OAuth authentication and tools for querying data

headers.name: Authorization
headers.description: Bearer token for authentication, have the ts-host as 'token@ts-host' or as a separate 'x-ts-host' header

headers.name: X-TS-Host
headers.description: ThoughtSpot instance URL, if not provided in the authorization header
